name: Joseph L. FRIEDMAN v. Richard K. ROHRICH, an Individual, et al., Appellants

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: Joseph L. FRIEDMAN v. Richard K. ROHRICH, an Individual, et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed. Costs to be borne by appellants.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Vincent C. Murovich, Jr., Pittsburgh, for appellants.
Reed J. Davis, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
339 A.2d 520
Joseph L. FRIEDMAN v. Richard K. ROHRICH, an Individual, et al., Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 10, 1975.
Decided May 13, 1975.
Rehearing Denied July 7, 1975.
Vincent C. Murovich, Jr., Pittsburgh, for appellants.
Reed J. Davis, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
